verses.verse: כִּ֤י <WH3588> If יִגְנֹֽב־ <WH1589> shall steal אִישׁ֙ <WH376> If a man שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> an ox אוֹ־ <WH176> or שֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> or a sheep וּטְבָח֖וֹ <WH2873> and kill א֣וֹ <WH176> or מְכָר֑וֹ <WH4376> it or sell חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> five בָקָ֗ר <WH1241> oxen יְשַׁלֵּם֙ <WH7999> it he shall restore תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash הַשּׁ֔וֹר <WH7794> for an ox וְאַרְבַּע־ <WH702> and four צֹ֖אן <WH6629> sheep תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <WH7716> for a sheep

אִם־ <WH518> If בַּמַּחְתֶּ֛רֶת <WH4290> breaking up יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <WH1590> If a thief וְהֻכָּ֣ה <WH5221> and be smitten וָמֵ֑ת <WH4191> that he die אֵ֥ין <WH369> there ל֖וֹ דָּמִֽים׃ <WH1818> [there shall] no blood

אִם־ <WH518> if זָרְחָ֥ה <WH2224> be risen הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <WH8121> If the sun עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> on דָּמִ֣ים <WH1818> upon him [there shall be] blood ל֑וֹ שַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> [shed] for him [for] he should make full יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> restitution אִם־ <WH518> if אֵ֣ין <WH369> nothing ל֔וֹ וְנִמְכַּ֖ר <WH4376> if he have nothing then he shall be sold בִּגְנֵבָתֽוֹ׃ <WH1591> for his theft

אִֽם־ <WH518> If הִמָּצֵא֩ <WH4672> be certainly תִמָּצֵ֨א <WH4672> found בְיָד֜וֹ <WH3027> in his hand הַגְּנֵבָ֗ה <WH1591> If the theft מִשּׁ֧וֹר <WH7794> whether it be ox עַד־ <WH5704> or חֲמ֛וֹר <WH2543> or ass עַד־ <WH5704> or שֶׂ֖ה <WH7716> or sheep חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> alive שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> double יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> he shall restore ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> If יַבְעֶר־ <WH1197> to be eaten אִישׁ֙ <WH376> If a man שָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> shall cause a field אוֹ־ <WH176> or כֶ֔רֶם <WH3754> or vineyard וְשִׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> and shall put אֶת־ <WH853> [בְּעִירָה כ] (בְּעִירֹ֔ו <WH1165> beast ק) וּבִעֵ֖ר <WH1197> and shall feed בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> field אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> in another man's מֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> of the best שָׂדֵ֛הוּ <WH7704> of his own field וּמֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> and of the best כַּרְמ֖וֹ <WH3754> of his own vineyard יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> shall he make restitution ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> break out אֵ֜שׁ <WH784> If fire וּמָצְאָ֤ה <WH4672> and catch קֹצִים֙ <WH6975> in thorns וְנֶאֱכַ֣ל <WH398> be consumed גָּדִ֔ישׁ <WH1430> so that the stacks of corn א֥וֹ <WH176> or הַקָּמָ֖ה <WH7054> or the standing corn א֣וֹ <WH176> or הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> or the field שַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> shall surely יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> make restitution הַמַּבְעִ֖ר <WH1197> [therewith] he that kindled אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעֵרָֽה׃ <WH1200> the fire ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> shall deliver אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> If a man אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> unto his neighbour כֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> money אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or כֵלִים֙ <WH3627> or stuff לִשְׁמֹ֔ר <WH8104> to keep וְגֻנַּ֖ב <WH1589> and it be stolen מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> out of the man's אִם־ <WH518> if יִמָּצֵ֥א <WH4672> be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <WH1590> if the thief יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> let him pay שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> double

אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֤א <WH3808> be not יִמָּצֵא֙ <WH4672> found הַגַּנָּ֔ב <WH1590> If the thief וְנִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> shall be brought בַּֽעַל־ <WH1167> then the master הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house אֶל־ <WH413> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto the judges אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> [to see] whether he have put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand בִּמְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> goods רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> unto his neighbour's

עַֽל־ <WH5921> For כָּל־ <WH3605> every דְּבַר־ <WH1697> For all manner פֶּ֡שַׁע <WH6588> of trespass עַל־ <WH5921> for שׁ֡וֹר <WH7794> [whether it be] for ox עַל־ <WH5921> for חֲ֠מוֹר <WH2543> for ass עַל־ <WH5921> for שֶׂ֨ה <WH7716> for sheep עַל־ <WH5921> for שַׂלְמָ֜ה <WH8008> for raiment עַל־ <WH5921> for כָּל־ <WH3605> any אֲבֵדָ֗ה <WH9> [or] for any manner of lost thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> which [another] challengeth כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֣וּא <WH1931> he זֶ֔ה <WH2088> This עַ֚ד <WH5704> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> before the judges יָבֹ֖א <WH935> shall come דְּבַר־ <WH1697> to be his the cause שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> of both parties אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom יַרְשִׁיעֻן֙ <WH7561> shall condemn אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [and] whom the judges יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> he shall pay שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> double לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> unto his neighbour ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> deliver אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> If a man אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> unto his neighbour חֲמ֨וֹר <WH2543> an ass אוֹ־ <WH176> or שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> or an ox אוֹ־ <WH176> or שֶׂ֛ה <WH7716> or a sheep וְכָל־ <WH3605> any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> or any beast לִשְׁמֹ֑ר <WH8104> to keep וּמֵ֛ת <WH4191> and it die אוֹ־ <WH176> or נִשְׁבַּ֥ר <WH7665> or be hurt אוֹ־ <WH176> or נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <WH7617> or driven away אֵ֥ין <WH369> no רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> no man seeing

שְׁבֻעַ֣ת <WH7621> [Then] shall an oath יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD תִּהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> shall be made בֵּ֣ין <WH996> by שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> be between them both אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not שָׁלַ֛ח <WH7971> that he hath not put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand בִּמְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> goods רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> unto his neighbour's וְלָקַ֥ח <WH3947> of it shall accept בְּעָלָ֖יו <WH1167> and the owner וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> [thereof] and he shall not make [it] good
וְאִם־ <WH518> if גָּנֹ֥ב <WH1589> is actually יִגָּנֵ֖ב <WH1589> stolen מֵעִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with יְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> from him he shall make restitution לִבְעָלָֽיו׃ <WH1167> unto the owner

אִם־ <WH518> If טָרֹ֥ף <WH2963> torn יִטָּרֵ֖ף <WH2963> to pieces יְבִאֵ֣הוּ <WH935> [then] let him bring עֵ֑ד <WH5707> it [for] witness הַטְּרֵפָ֖ה <WH2966> that which was torn לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> [and] he shall not make good פ

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יִשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> borrow אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> And if a man מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> thereof [being] not with it רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> [ought] of his neighbour וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ר <WH7665> and it be hurt אוֹ־ <WH176> or מֵ֑ת <WH4191> or die בְּעָלָ֥יו <WH1167> the owner אֵין־ <WH369> else עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with שַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> he shall surely יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> make [it] good

אִם־ <WH518> If בְּעָלָ֥יו <WH1167> [But] if the owner עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> thereof [be] with it he shall not make [it] good אִם־ <WH518> if שָׂכִ֣יר <WH7916> if it [be] an hired ה֔וּא <WH1931> it בָּ֖א <WH935> [thing] it came בִּשְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <WH7939> for his hire ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יְפַתֶּ֣ה <WH6601> entice אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man בְּתוּלָ֛ה <WH1330> a maid אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> is not אֹרָ֖שָׂה <WH781> that is not betrothed וְשָׁכַ֣ב <WH7901> and lie עִמָּ֑הּ <WH5973> must מָהֹ֛ר <WH4117> with her he shall surely יִמְהָרֶ֥נָּה <WH4117> endow לּ֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> her to be his wife

אִם־ <WH518> If מָאֵ֧ן <WH3985> utterly יְמָאֵ֛ן <WH3985> refuse אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> If her father לְתִתָּ֣הּ <WH5414> to give ל֑וֹ כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> money יִשְׁקֹ֔ל <WH8254> her unto him he shall pay כְּמֹ֖הַר <WH4119> according to the dowry הַבְּתוּלֹֽת׃ <WH1330> of virgins ס
מְכַשֵּׁפָ֖ה <WH3784> Thou shalt not suffer a witch לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תְחַיֶּֽה׃ <WH2421> to live ס
כָּל־ <WH3605> Whoever שֹׁכֵ֥ב <WH7901> Whosoever lieth עִם־ <WH5973> with בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> with a beast מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death ס

זֹבֵ֥חַ <WH2076> He that sacrificeth לָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> unto [any] god יָֽחֳרָ֑ם <WH2763> only he shall be utterly destroyed בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> save לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone

וְגֵ֥ר <WH1616> a stranger לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תוֹנֶ֖ה <WH3238> Thou shalt neither vex וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or תִלְחָצֶ֑נּוּ <WH3905> nor oppress כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֵרִ֥ים <WH1616> him for ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt
כָּל־ <WH3605> any אַלְמָנָ֥ה <WH490> any widow וְיָת֖וֹם <WH3490> or fatherless child לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְעַנּֽוּן׃ <WH6031> Ye shall not afflict

אִם־ <WH518> If עַנֵּ֥ה <WH6031> thou afflict תְעַנֶּ֖ה <WH6031> them in any wise אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> if צָעֹ֤ק <WH6817> and they cry יִצְעַק֙ <WH6817> at all אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to שָׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> unto me I will surely אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> hear צַעֲקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6818> their cry

וְחָרָ֣ה <WH2734> shall wax hot אַפִּ֔י <WH639> And my wrath וְהָרַגְתִּ֥י <WH2026> and I will kill אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> you with the sword וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> shall become נְשֵׁיכֶם֙ <WH802> and your wives אַלְמָנ֔וֹת <WH490> shall be widows וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> and your children יְתֹמִֽים׃ <WH3490> fatherless פ

אִם־ <WH518> If כֶּ֣סֶף ׀ <WH3701> money תַּלְוֶ֣ה <WH3867> If thou lend אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֗י <WH5971> to [any of] my people אֶת־ <WH853> הֶֽעָנִי֙ <WH6041> [that is] poor עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> among לֹא־ <WH3808> are not תִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> to act ל֖וֹ כְּנֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH5383> by thee thou shalt not be to him as an usurer לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תְשִׂימ֥וּן <WH7760> neither shalt thou lay עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and נֶֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH5392> upon him usury

אִם־ <WH518> If חָבֹ֥ל <WH2254> If thou at all תַּחְבֹּ֖ל <WH2254> to pledge שַׂלְמַ֣ת <WH8008> raiment רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> thy neighbour's עַד־ <WH5704> it unto him by בֹּ֥א <WH935> goeth down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> that the sun תְּשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <WH7725> thou shalt deliver לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> when הִ֤וא <WH1931> he [כְסוּתָה כ] (כְסוּתֹו֙ <WH3682> covering ק) לְבַדָּ֔הּ <WH905> is his only הִ֥וא <WH1931> it שִׂמְלָת֖וֹ <WH8071> only it [is] his raiment לְעֹר֑וֹ <WH5785> for his skin בַּמֶּ֣ה <WH4100> What יִשְׁכָּ֔ב <WH7901> wherein shall he sleep וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יִצְעַ֣ק <WH6817> ? and it shall come to pass when he crieth אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to וְשָׁמַעְתִּ֖י <WH8085> unto me that I will hear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when חַנּ֥וּן <WH2587> for I [am] gracious אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I ס
אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> the gods לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תְקַלֵּ֑ל <WH7043> Thou shalt not revile וְנָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> the ruler בְעַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> of thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תָאֹֽר׃ <WH779> nor curse

מְלֵאָתְךָ֥ <WH4395> [to offer] the first of thy ripe fruits וְדִמְעֲךָ֖ <WH1831> and of thy liquors לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תְאַחֵ֑ר <WH309> Thou shalt not delay בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn בָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> of thy sons תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> shalt thou give לִּֽי׃

כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> Likewise תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou do לְשֹׁרְךָ֖ <WH7794> with thine oxen לְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> [and] with thy sheep שִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> seven יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> its אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> it shall be with his dam בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֖י <WH8066> on the eighth תִּתְּנוֹ־ <WH5414> thou shalt give לִֽי׃

וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> And ye shall be holy תִּהְי֣וּן <WH1961> become לִ֑י וּבָשָׂ֨ר <WH1320> [any] flesh בַּשָּׂדֶ֤ה <WH7704> in the field טְרֵפָה֙ <WH2966> [that is] torn of beasts לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> unto me neither shall ye eat לַכֶּ֖לֶב <WH3611> it to the dogs תַּשְׁלִכ֥וּן <WH7993> ye shall cast אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> ס
